name: HSP_SPEC_NEED
description: The HSP_SPEC_NEED table contains information on inpatient special needs.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient with this special need.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the special need for the patient.

columns.name: SPECIAL_NEED_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the special need for the patient.
